title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text: Welcome to the website of the RuhrMetrics reading group! The objective of the reading group is to create a place of exchange for all econometrics enthusiasts. We intend to read papers that appeal to the average econometric practitioner. Our goal is to read papers that are groundbreaking and seminal in the field, be it the classic GAMLSS paper from Rigby & Stasinopoulos (2005) or a recent contribution such as the Matrix Autoregressive models by Chen et al. (2020). In every session we have a 20 min presentation of a paper and then discuss the main takeaways. Afterwards, we have the tradition to go out together for dinner were the discussion takes new directions into either socializing with new people or into new research topics.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Next Sessions
Thank you all participants from the last semester. Please take a look at the tab above in order to express your interest for the upcoming semester.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Location
All meetings (for the time being) will be held in the University of Essen in room R12 R06 A48.






 For those not familiar with the numbering system, R12 is the entrance number to the red building, R06 means to take the red elevator to the sixth floor and A48 is room 48 in hallway A.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Contacts
If you have any question, you can contact either Christian or Ignacio.

Christian Schulz
Ignacio Moreira Lara

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Time and location
Given the success of meeting at 5:00 on Thursday during the last semesters, we decided to keep this date as the official time for the sessions.
All sessions will be held in the University of Essen in room R12 R06 A48.






 For those not familiar with the numbering system, R12 is the entrance number to the red building, R06 means to take the red elevator to the sixth floor and A48 is room 48 in hallway A.
